Articles.Content: My first post but I've been lurking, trying to avoid acquiring anymore passwords, but my lack of knowledge has made me realize I have questions that can only be answered by this great community. Rest assured I'll pay it forward, and post in the appropriate forum. You've all helped me so much already. Thanks

Welcome to the forums!

Enjoy your stay and if you've problems we will try to help.

Have a question? Post it in the Gameplay Question and Tutorials section.
Welcome to the forums Aethon, you're one of us now. One of us. One of us. One of us.

Thanks for the welcome.

K, I give... How do I get my profile picture to come up when I post? I tried customizing but no luck.

Welcome to the forums!

Thing is, your avatar and your profile picture are actually two separate things. (Yes, it's confusing.) You should be able to set an avatar through the "Edit Avatar" option in the sidebar of your Settings page.
Cool. Thanks specialist. See the monkey took his own picture.
